newsitem.title: JAPAN: Tokai collapse will not lead to other failures-EPA.
newsitem.headline: Tokai collapse will not lead to other failures-EPA.

text.p: The collapse of general contractor Tokai Kogyo Co Ltd, which filed for court protection from creditors on Friday, should not lead to failures at other construction firms, Economic Planning Agency Minister Taro Aso said on Tuesday.
He said that Tokai's problems had not arisen through its main construction business but through property investments made during the "bubble" era of inflated asset prices.
"I doubt there will be any major failures coming out of this," Aso told a news conference.
